item.title: Disable images at Firefox
item.description: Disable image rendering in Firefox Sometime ago I did not have an ADSL internet connection at home. I managed to make my smartphone a hotspot and accessing its internet connection via my laptop. Disabling the image rendering proved to save some change. You only need to adjust the settings via about:config. Open Firefox Type about: config in the address bar. Search for permissions.default.image and adjust the value to 2.
